subject: Cricket (Game)
Cheating
Decisions and Verdicts
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: A jury found two former members of Pakistan’s national team, Salman Butt and Mohammed Asif, guilty on Tuesday of conspiracy to cheat in a contest with England last summer.
snippet: A jury found two former members of Pakistan’s national team, Salman Butt and Mohammed Asif, guilty on Tuesday of conspiracy to cheat in a contest with England last summer.
